physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the marble baradari pavillion in Lahore. In the photograph
 there is a clearing with a path leading up to the building. The building is a two-leveled pavillion
 with pillars supporting three arches. There is a fence behind the building. There are no individuals in the photograph. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the marble baradari pavillion in Lahore. In the photograph, there is a clearing with a path leading up to the building. The building is a two-leveled pavillion, with pillars supporting three arches. There is a fence behind the building. There are no individuals in the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
